5 'Leftside Right
10 LET[0],8968,17240,6212,9472,23904,8822,8961,6866,14880,1,16401,16456,16537,16600,17160,91,11016,53748,64,21856,7277,11528,53740,18288
15 CLS
20 FORX=7TO0STEP-1
25 FORY=0TO5
30 J=#B1+RND(45): G=#700+8*RND(32)
35 COPYG,J*8,8: J=G/8
40 Z=USR(#800,J)
45 LCX+11,Y+8:?CHR$(J);
50 NEXT
55 NEXT
60 GOTO20
